name: MCNearbyServiceAdvertiserDelegate
desc: The MCNearbyServiceAdvertiserDelegate protocol describes the methods that the delegate object for an MCNearbyServiceAdvertiser instance can implement for handling events from the MCNearbyServiceAdvertiser class.

items.name: func advertiser(MCNearbyServiceAdvertiser, didReceiveInvitationFromPeer: MCPeerID, withContext: Data?, invitationHandler: (Bool, MCSession?) -> Void)
items.desc: Called when an invitation to join a session is received from a nearby peer.
